description: Android app for converting iPhone/Mac HEIC images and HEVC videos to Android-compatible formats (JPEG/PNG/WebP for images, H.264 for videos). Features cosmic-themed UI with Firebase authentication and AdMob monetization.
coreFeatures: HEIC/HEIF image conversion to JPEG/PNG/WebP using Android BitmapFactory/ImageDecoder
HEVC video transcoding to H.264 using native Android MediaCodec/MediaMuxer (no external dependencies)
Background video processing with foreground service and notifications
Google AdMob integration with banner ads
In-app billing support (Google Play Billing Library 7.1.1)
Cosmic-themed login UI with sacred geometry (Tree of Life/Kabbalah)

externalDependencies.videoConversion: NONE - Uses native Android MediaCodec (no FFmpeg, no external libraries)

videoTranscoding.strategy: Decode HEVC frames → Pass to encoder surface → Encode as H.264
videoTranscoding.optimization: Smart detection: remux if already H.264, transcode only if HEVC
videoTranscoding.outputFormat: MP4 container with H.264 video track

steps: 1. Generate keystore: keytool -genkey -v -keystore your-keystore.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -alias your-key-alias
2. Add to gradle.properties: RELEASE_STORE_FILE, RELEASE_STORE_PASSWORD, RELEASE_KEY_ALIAS, RELEASE_KEY_PASSWORD
3. Replace test AdMob ad unit IDs with production IDs from AdMob console
4. Add privacy policy URL to Play Store listing
5. Update app icon and launcher assets
